text: The 2019–20 season is Lee Man's 3rd consecutive season in Hong Kong Premier League, the top-tier division in Hong Kong football. Lee Man will compete in the Premier League, Senior Challenge Shield, FA Cup and Sapling Cup this season. Despite their roots in Tseung Kwan O, the club plays its home matches at Sham Shui Po Sports Ground. == Squad == === Current squad === :As of 21 September 2020 FP FP FP FP FP LP Players' positions as per club's announcement. Remarks: LP These players are considered as local players in Hong Kong domestic football competitions.
